meta.notes: Narrative flavor text for zones, items, encounters, and ambient motifs.

dream_gate: Mist rolls like memory here. Every breath feels like a half-forgotten story.
A child’s voice hums from the other side of the threshold — not in words, but in symbols.
market_ruins: Old signs still whisper prices, though no one is here to pay them.
You feel as if every coin dropped here would echo forever.
ancient_gate: The metal surface is pitted and scarred. It seems more like a scar in the world than a door.
Rust peels in patterns that resemble constellations.
reflected_chamber: You wave — and five versions of yourself wave back, each delayed by a heartbeat.
The mirrors sometimes blink before you do.
signal_vault: A low hum fills your bones. Every shelf radiates forgotten broadcasts.
You catch static laughter in the walls, as though the past is replaying itself.
flooded_library: Books drip and slosh, pages dissolving into memory currents.
Some shelves float. Others lean like broken teeth.

items.mirror_wand: A slender rod tipped with a shard of mirror. It hums with reflected meaning.
items.glyph_of_insight: This glyph pulses softly — it wants to be read, but resists easy translation.
items.rusted_key: Its teeth are dull, but its promise is sharp.
items.symbolic_coin: Each flip lands on memory, not chance.
items.sealed_book: The cover is warped, but the lock on its clasp feels like an echo itself.
items.wisdoms_globe: A sphere of glassy water that carries fragments of memory in slow orbits.
items.crystal_orb: You glimpse tomorrow’s outlines within, though never clearly.
items.driftwood_wand: Saltwater still drips from its surface; it points where tides remember.
items.healing_potion: Cool liquid that knits symbols back into form.
items.amplifier_node: A small device, humming as though ready to catch forgotten broadcasts.
items.signal_scroll: Its glyphs hum like antennas, reaching for signals long lost.

Archivist: The market remembers what the vault forgets.
Some trades are never completed, yet still ripple outward.
Custodian: Keys are promises made to the past.
Every locked door is a kind of silence.

global_motifs: You hear a faint child’s laugh, just beyond the edge of the scene.
Symbols hover at the corner of vision, rearranging themselves when you blink.
Echoes stretch longer than they should, as if sound resists ending.
A shiver of static runs down your spine — perhaps the world is listening.
Somewhere nearby, an unseen page is turning.
